mapper.select: SELECT qr.quadrangle_id, qr.name, ST_AsText(ST_Simplify(ST_Transform(geog::GEOMETRY, 3857), 5000)) AS wkt FROM quadrangle AS qr WHERE qr.scale = 250000 ORDER BY name
mapper.sql: SELECT DISTINCT qr.quadrangle_id, qr.name, qr.alt_name, qr.abbr, qr.alt_abbr, qr.scale
mapper.select: FROM borehole AS bh JOIN borehole_geog AS bg ON bg.borehole_id = bh.borehole_id JOIN quadrangle AS qr ON ST_Intersects(qr.geog, bg.geog) WHERE bh.prospect_id = #{prospect_id} AND qr.scale = 250000
FROM borehole_geog AS bg JOIN quadrangle AS qr ON ST_Intersects(qr.geog, bg.geog) WHERE bg.borehole_id = #{borehole_id} AND qr.scale = 250000
FROM well_geog AS wg JOIN quadrangle_geog AS qg ON ST_Intersects(qg.geog, wg.geog) JOIN quadrangle AS qr ON qr.quadrangle_id = qg.quadrangle_id WHERE wg.well_id = #{well_id} AND qg.scale = 250000
